snippet: A restaurant deliveryman was clinging to life Thursday night after he was struck by a vehicle in East Harlem, the police said.
abstract: Police say restaurant deliveryman is in critical condition after he was struck by a vehicle in East Harlem; vehicle left the scene and has not been found.
lead_paragraph: A restaurant deliveryman was clinging to life Thursday night after he was struck by a vehicle in East Harlem, the police said.
